mutants.code:
from math import gcd

def min_steps_to_equalize_array(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    if all((x == arr[0] for x in arr)):
        return 0
    overall_gcd = 1
    for num in arr:
        overall_gcd = gcd(overall_gcd, num)
    reduced_arr = [num // overall_gcd for num in arr]
    max_steps = 0
    for i in range(n):
        g1 = reduced_arr[i]
        g2 = reduced_arr[(i + 1) % n]
        ind = i
        while g1 != g2:
            g1 = gcd(g1, reduced_arr[ind % n])
            g2 = gcd(g2, reduced_arr[(ind + 1) % n])
            ind += 1
        max_steps = max(max_steps, ind - i - 1)
    return max_steps

    return max_steps

        ind = i
        while g1 != g2:
            g1 = gcd(g1, reduced_arr[ind % n])
            g2 = gcd(g2, reduced_arr[(ind + 1) % n])
            ind += 1
        max_steps = max(max_steps, ind - i - 1)
    return max_steps

def min_steps_to_equalize_array(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    if all((x == arr[0] for x in arr)):
        return 0
    overall_gcd = 0
    for num in arr:
        overall_gcd = gcd(overall_gcd, num)
    reduced_arr = [num // overall_gcd for num in arr]

        while g1 != g2:

            g2 = gcd(g2, reduced_arr[(ind + -1) % n])
            ind += 1
